meanings.definition: A type of moth larva that constructs a protective bag made of silk and plant material.
meanings.sent1: Bagworms build small bags to protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: I saw bagworms hanging from the tree branches.
meanings.sent3: The bagworms had a fashion show with their silk bags.
meanings.sent4: The bagworms' protective bags were like tiny fortresses.
meanings.sent5: The sight of bagworms in their silk bags was fascinating.

meanings.definition: The larvae of certain insects that feed on plants and construct protective cases around themselves.
meanings.sent1: Bagworms can damage plants by feeding on them.
meanings.sent2: The garden was infested with bagworms.
meanings.sent3: The bagworms threw a party in their plant cases.
meanings.sent4: The bagworms' protective cases were like tiny homes.
meanings.sent5: The bagworms munching on plants were a nuisance.
